attributes.action: Restrict commercial vehicles over 7.5 tonnes to lane 1 on Motorways to increase flow of traffic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Overtaking commercial vehicles cause severe delays when the speed differential is very low causing other vehicles to be delayed behind the overtaking vehicle.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
